divs: Sighting DetailsTwo triangle patterns of discs, one in the middle desended in a "flutter" pattern leaving the two triangle patterns. When an aircraft approx 20K heading west came into view they went into a straight line of 5 heading approx NE to SW with one on the East side mid line. After the plane past the area they went back to two triangle patterns. We saw three into one on easter at the approx same location. This was sun. 1500 on the end of SBA breakwater, my wife and grandson also saw them. After approx 10 minutes they departed from view. No fear having seen the likes before.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Santa Barbara
There were no other sightings in Santa Barbara on or around August 3rd 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
